initialization.title: Instrument Initialization
initialization.description: General issues encountered during initialization of the instrument testing
initialization.solutions: 1. Check COM port connection, and the 4 way valve dial is set to 0, and syringe pump dial is set to 1
initialization.issue: Random keypress during instrument imaging, or after firs booting into Windows 10
initialization.solutions: Unplug Temp and Humitidy USB sensor (ADD PART NUMBER)
initialization.issue: RGBLaser system error message on launching AutoFAT
initialization.solutions: Check all the USB cable is connected to motherboard
Unplug Temp and Humitidy USB sensor, might be malfunctioned (ADD PART NUMBER)

BEC_Insertion.title: Instrument Initialization
BEC_Insertion.description: General issues encountered during BEC Insertion
BEC_Insertion.solutions: Wipe the MEZZ PCBA pogo pins, and BEC PCB pin grid with tissue
Check MEZZ PCBA pogo pins, some might be stuck
Make sure the BEC is primed, and the protective red cap is removed from HV socket (ADD PART NUMBER)

Issues.title: Instrument Initialization troubleshooting
Issues.description: General issues encountered during initialization of the instrument testing
